meanings.sent1: The gristlier meat was difficult to chew.
meanings.sent2: The gristlier steak needed more time to cook.
meanings.sent3: The gristlier chicken made the dog's tail wag faster.
meanings.sent4: The gristlier texture of the fish reminded her of rubber bands.
meanings.sent5: The gristlier vegetables felt like biting into a pencil eraser.

meanings.definition: Having a tough or chewy texture.
meanings.sent1: The gristlier jerky required strong teeth to eat.
meanings.sent2: The gristlier bread was not enjoyable to eat.
meanings.sent3: The gristlier candy made her jaw ache from chewing.
meanings.sent4: The gristlier texture of the fruit was like chewing on leather.
meanings.sent5: The gristlier steak felt like eating a shoe sole.
